name: virtual-swamp-animals
tagline: Website presenting a virtual reality project for Google Cardboard depicting the food chain in a swamp. Experience life as a bug, frog, and a raven and interact with your environment with a full range of movements. This website outlines the capabilities of the game, lists references used, and provides a video of gameplay.
body:
### Description

### Technical explanation of the project

###Game Screenshots

### Gameplay Video
7 minute Youtube Video - 6 minute of the experience followed by 1 minute explaining technical components
View a video of gameplay at this link.

### To Dos
Email TAs your own estimated grade for the whole project and divide up 100 points of effort amongst the members (this will be kept deidentified, but will factor into grade)


### Authors and Contributors
@marieurmano, @reidgill, and @EvanMAmstutz worked on this project in Spring 2016 for the University of Florida's Virtual Reality class taught by Benjamin Lok.

### References
We utilized some models for our unity project. Listed below are the people credited for creating these aspects of our game.
